atHigherLevels: The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: Two beams at 5th levelThree beams at 11th levelFour beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.
description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.
name: Eldritch Blast
